title: Red, green, blue screen
message:
Hi, 

I just replaced the screen fo a late 2008 13" unibody model. Now it flashes Red-Green-Blue. Is there a common problem that can cause this?

Thanks, Rick

title: Red, green, blue screen
message:
Bad screen or cable. 
I assume the screen you replaced was cracker of had lines.

title: Red, green, blue screen
message: What was the issue with the original LCD?

title: Red, green, blue screen
message: The original had a cracked screen but still worked. So it must be related to the cable or new screen. I was wondering if it needed some kind of reset.
